select.files

Class SelectMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • select.files.SelectMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileFilter

    public abstract class SelectMode
extends Object
implements FileFilter
    Data model, which encapsulates all selection logic. Specifies, which files should be shown, defines, which actions should be taken due to specific UI clicks.
    Author:
    ostap.andrusiv
